Title: Egypt teammates rally behind unsettled Salah before AFCON
Summary: Egypt teammates rally behind unsettled Salah ahead of 2025 AFCON in Morocco . Mohamed Salah’s Liverpool future is uncertain . Egypt teammates have expressed strong support for him ahead of the tournament .

Title: Nobel peace laureates who did not pick up their prize
Summary: Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado is not the first Nobel Peace Prize winner who could not pick up their prize . Here are other notable absentees at the Oslo awards ceremony: 2023: Narges Mohammadi .

Title: Accord Party screens, clears Adeleke for Osun governorship primary
Summary: Accord Party screens, clears Adeleke for Osun governorship primary . Hours after announcing defection to Accord Party, Ademola Adleke has been cleared for the election . Delegates are converging at the Oasis Event Hall in Osogbo for the primary .

Title: No opposition, coalition capable of defeating Tinubu in 2027 – Adegbonmire
Summary: Adeniyi Adegbonmire said there is no serious opposition or coalition capable of defeating President Bola Tinubu in 2027 . While emphasising that the general elections will be a smooth, he said the general election will be smooth .

Title: Olubadan to elevate Makinde, Dotun Sanusi, Akin Alabi, others on Friday
Summary: Olubadan of Ibadanland, Oba Rashidi Adewolu Ladoja, is set to elevate nine chiefs in the Otun line on Friday . The promotions, which range from Dotun Sanusi to Akin Alabi, will reaffirm the long-standing structure and prestige of the traditional council .

Title: Trump ends birthright citizenship in US, says it was ‘for slaves, not rich’
Summary: US President Donald Trump ends birthright citizenship in US, says it was ‘for slaves, not rich’ He said it was introduced to protect the children of enslaved people .

Title: Why I chronicled my experiences as Buhari’s minister – Lai Mohammed
Summary: "I will be failing posterity if I do not document all the experiences and what I went through," Lai Mohammed said . “I will not document everything I did,” he said .

Title: Pogba invests in Saudi Arabian camel racing team Al Haboob
Summary: Pogba invests in Saudi Arabian camel racing team Al Haboob . Pogba believes the principles behind camel racing mirror those found in other global sports . Camel racing remains one of the most traditional and culturally significant sports in the Middle East .

Title: Insecurity: Ndume praises Tinubu, urges northern govs to emulate Zulum
Summary: Ndume said in Abuja on Wednesday that the measures so far taken by the president in response to the myriad of security threats to Nigeria’s sovereignty have already begun yielding positive results .

Title: Alleged N2.4 bn fraud: FG arraigns ex-aviation minister Stella Oduah
Summary: Stella Oduah arraigned in Abuja High Court over alleged fraud of N2.4 billion . Federal Government arraigned former Minister of Aviation . Stella was accused of fraudulently defrauded the money .

Title: Osun 2026: Accord Party clears Adeleke for gov primary
Summary: The screening committee of the Accord Party has cleared Governor Ademola Adeleke to participate in the party’s governorship primary, ongoing on Wednesday in Osogbo . Title: Osun: Adeleke, deputy present as Accord Party begins gov primary
Summary: Osun State Governor, Ademola Adeleke, his deputy, Kola Adewusi, and several political appointees were present on Wednesday as the Accord Party commenced its governorship primary in Osogbo . Security was tight at the venue, with armed police operatives and officials of the Department of State Services taking strategic positions

Title: Fire kills 12 in South China residential building
Summary: Blaze at four-storey building in Shantou, Guangdong province, erupted around 9:20 pm on Tuesday . It comes after huge blaze last month engulfed several high-rise residential towers in Hong Kong, killing 160 people . Blaze affected area of 150 square metres (1,600 square feet)

Title: Police arrest armed robbery suspect in Anambra
Summary: The Anambra State Police Command arrested a 26-year-old armed robbery suspect identified as Ugochukwu Uzor during a major offensive operation at Iyiowa Odekpe in the Ogbaru Local Government Area of the state . Title: Olubadan to elevate Makinde’s brother, eight other chiefs Friday
Summary: The Olubadan of Ibadanland, Oba Rashidi Ladoja, will elevate Governor Seyi Makinde’s elder brother, Olumuyiwa Makine, and eight other chiefs . The ceremony will begin at 11 am on Friday at the Oke-Aremo Palace in Ibad
